description: This file is a test specification for the HelloWorld Vue component using Vitest. It includes test setup, component mounting, and assertions.

methods.name: describe
methods.description: Defines a test suite for the HelloWorld component.

methods.name: it
methods.description: Defines a test case to verify proper rendering of the component.

methods.name: expect
methods.description: Assertion method to check if the component text contains the expected message.

ctags.name: wrapper
ctags.pattern: /^    const wrapper = mount(HelloWorld, { props: { msg: 'Hello Vitest' } })$/
